title: Buildings
description: A list of buildings and wonders you want to use.

production.title: Production
production.description: Production yield provided by this building per turn.

food.title: Food
food.description: Food yield provided by this building per turn.

gold.title: Gold
gold.description: Gold yield provided by this building per turn.

science.title: Science
science.description: Science yield provided by this building per turn.

culture.title: Culture
culture.description: Culture yield provided by this building per turn.

faith.title: Faith
faith.description: Faith yield provided by this building per turn.

uniques.description: Unique effects provided by this building.

requiredTech.title: Required Tech
requiredTech.description: The tech that should be researched before this building may be built. Must be in Techs.json.

cost.title: Cost
cost.description: Amount of production required to build the building. If -1, the buildingCost from requiredTech column is used.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.description: Gold upkeep per turn for this building.

percentStatBonus.title: Percent Stat Bonus
percentStatBonus.description: Percent-based stat bonuses provided by this building.

specialistSlots.title: Specialist Slots
specialistSlots.description: How many specialists of each type does this building allow for. Key must be name of existing specialist, as defined in Specialists.json.

greatPersonPoints.title: Great Person Points
greatPersonPoints.description: Which Great Person Points this building generates per turn. Key must be name of Great Person unit.

hurryCostModifier.title: Hurry Cost Modifier
hurryCostModifier.description: When this building is bought using gold or faith, the price is increased by this much percent.

isWonder.title: Is Wonder
isWonder.description: Whether this building is a global wonder.

isNationalWonder.title: Is National Wonder
isNationalWonder.description: Whether this building is a national wonder.

requiredBuilding.title: Required Building
requiredBuilding.description: A building that has to be built before this building can be built. Must be in Buildings.json.

requiredResource.title: Required Resource
requiredResource.description: The resource that is consumed when building this building. Must be in TileResources.json.

requiredNearbyImprovedResources.title: Required Nearby Improved Resources
requiredNearbyImprovedResources.description: List of improved resources that must be nearby for this building to be constructed.

cityStrength.description: Strength bonus the city in which this building is built receives.
cityStrength.title: City Strength

cityHealth.description: Health bonus the city in which this building is built receives.
cityHealth.title: City Health

uniqueTo.title: Unique To
uniqueTo.description: If supplied, only the nation with this name can build this building. Must be in Nations.json.

replaces.title: Replaces
replaces.description: The name of a building that should be replaced by this building. Must be in Buildings.json.

quote.title: Quote
quote.description: If this building is a wonder, this string will be shown on the completion popup.

replacementTextForUniques.title: Replacement Text For Uniques
replacementTextForUniques.description: Freeform text that will be shown to users, overriding the list of uniques.
